describe: Albania is a small country located in Southeast Europe on the Balkan Peninsula. It is known for its rich history, stunning landscapes, and vibrant culture. The country features a diverse range of natural beauty, from its pristine beaches along the Adriatic and Ionian Seas to its rugged mountains and ancient ruins.

cities.name: 🏙 Tirana
cities.geographical_location: Located in the central part of Albania, Tirana is the capital and largest city of the country.
cities.climate: Tirana experiences a Mediterranean climate with hot, dry summers and mild, wet winters.
cities.famous_cuisine: Fërgesë, Tavë Kosi, and Byrek are popular dishes in Tirana.

cities.name: 🏝 Saranda
cities.geographical_location: Situated on the Albanian Riviera in the southern part of the country, Sarandë is a coastal city.
cities.climate: Sarandë has a Mediterranean climate with warm, dry summers and mild, wet winters.
cities.famous_cuisine: Seafood dishes, such as grilled fish and shrimp, are popular in Sarandë.

cities.name: 🏰 Shkoda
cities.geographical_location: Located in the northwestern part of Albania, Shkodër is near the border with Montenegro.
cities.climate: Shkodër has a humid subtropical climate with hot summers and cool, wet winters.
cities.famous_cuisine: Tavë Krapi (carp dish) and Shkodër-style Byrek are local specialties.
